DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare efficacy botulinum toxin injection vestibulodynia pain compare group treat placebo .

DOC.criteria: Subject refractory conventional treatment ( tricyclic antidepressant benzodiazepine analgesic dos , biofeedback physical therapy ) Negative screen test result Notified associate factor Menopause , surgically sterilize woman woman use effective contraceptive method Good understanding predictable adherence protocol beneficiary/affiliated French social security/social healthcare sign Informed Consent Form Predictable poor adherence Pregnant breastfeed woman Myasthenia Treatment aminoglycosides Major mental disorder Underlying etiology Vulnerable subject ( particularly adults guardianship ) Any reason deem relevant investigator Current former ( last 3 month ) participation another clinical trial
